artist: Artist: Jean-Pierre Norblin de la Gourdaine
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: figure in white emerging from rectangular hole in ground, raising PL arm up; figure in white on raised platform with arm raised, the other gesturing toward figure on ground; small crowd of people gathered around standing figure in white; ruins in background
inscription:
Signature, Date, Inscription

inscribed on step where Christ stands: [NBf 1784]
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: signed and dated in plate, lower left: [Norblin fecit 1784]
title: Raising of Lazarus (Small Plate)
